panels.description:
Shaded area is the max to min of ALL Cockroach nodes
The lines are the heaviest clusters in each DC (by average of all their nodes)
If Shaded area is significantly higher, review to see if a cluster is suffering from hotspotting

targets.expr: max by(datacentre) (avg by(cluster_name,datacentre) (sum by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle",service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Cockroach"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Cockroach"}[$__rate_interval]))))

panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.expr: avg by(datacentre) (topk by(datacentre) (10,(((sum by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle",service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Postgres"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Postgres"}[$__rate_interval]))))) and (max by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (patroni_primary{service_type="Patroni",cluster_tech="Postgres"}==1)))))

max (((sum by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle",service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Postgres"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Postgres"}[$__rate_interval]))))) and (max by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (patroni_primary{service_type="Patroni",cluster_tech="Postgres"}==1)))

min (((sum by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle",service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Postgres"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Postgres"}[$__rate_interval]))))) and (max by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (patroni_primary{service_type="Patroni",cluster_tech="Postgres"}==1)))

max by(datacentre) ((max by (cluster_name, instance,datacentre) (label_replace(pg_replication_lag{cluster_name!="",service_type="Postgres Exporter"}, "instance", "$1", "instance", "(.*?):.*"))) and (max by(cluster_name, instance,datacentre) (label_replace(pg_stat_replication_pg_wal_lsn_diff{cluster_name!="",service_type="Postgres Exporter"} offset 1m > 0, "instance", "$1", "application_name", "(.*?)"))))

avg by(datacentre) (topk by(datacentre) (5,(avg by(datacentre,cluster_name) (((sum by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle",service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Couchbase"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Couchbase"}[$__rate_interval])))))))))

max (avg by(datacentre,cluster_name) (((sum by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle",service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Couchbase"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Couchbase"}[$__rate_interval])))))))

min (avg by(datacentre,cluster_name) (((sum by(instance,cluster_name,datacentre) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode!="idle",service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Couchbase"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{service_type="Node Exporter",cluster_tech="Couchbase"}[$__rate_interval])))))))
